DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the clinical and radiographic outcomes obtained with the use of the Stryker Triathalon Cruciate Substituting (CS) and Posterior Stabilized (PS) tibial inserts.
DOC.brief_title: Stryker Cruciate Substituting/Posterior Stabilized Outcomes Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study compares the clinical and radiographic outcomes obtained with the use of the Stryker Triathalon CS and PS tibial inserts.
DOC.criteria: Adults with DJD of the knee ages 2080 years old BMI less than 40 undergoing primary total knee arthroplasty
